name: Space Program 35
description:
THIS GAME IS FREE TO DOWNLOAD BUT IT WILL ASK YOU TO DONATE IF YOU WANT. YOU CAN JUST SKIP THAT AND GET IT FOR FREE. Download the itch app for easy downloads and updates!

You, our best astronaut on our planet, are sent to the moon to start setting up a base. But things do not go as planned. The moon lander crashes and you lose all your protection and communication with our planet.

Use A,D or the arrow keys to move.

Watch out for the meteors!
